meanings.definition: Belonging to or associated with a group of people previously mentioned or easily identified.
meanings.sent1: The students brought their books to class.
meanings.sent2: The family went on a picnic with their dog.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated their victory with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: The trees swayed in the wind, their branches reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The children held hands with their parents as they walked through the park.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate possession or ownership by more than one person.
meanings.sent1: The siblings shared their toys with each other.
meanings.sent2: The friends decided to bring their own snacks to the movie.
meanings.sent3: The cats groomed their fur meticulously, looking quite content.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled in the night sky, each shining in their own way.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors waved to each other from their respective driveways.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate possession or ownership by a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The committee members cast their votes on the new proposal.
meanings.sent2: The choir members raised their voices in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The fans cheered for their favorite team, hoping for a win.
meanings.sent4: The dancers moved in sync, their movements fluid and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The employees gathered in the conference room for their monthly meeting.
